BattleEffectText.Name: Instinct
BattleEffectText.Desc: This effect activates when this card deals 8 or more damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Mark
BattleEffectText.Desc: Speed and power increase by {0}. Effects changes depending on whether the Librarian is present at the phase transition.

BattleEffectText.Name: Brand
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice power when targeting Blooming Paradise is reduced by {0}, and all characters with Brand take damage and stagger damage Blooming Paradise would have taken split evenly. At the end of the scene, if Blooming Paradise has no remaining dice, it is reduced by 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Brand
BattleEffectText.Desc: Dice power increases by {0} and all characters with Brand take damage and stagger damage Blooming Paradise would have taken split evenly. At the end of the scene, if Blooming Paradise has no remaining dice, it is reduced by 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Whisper
BattleEffectText.Desc: Each time this is gained, you receive 1-2 damage and Stagger damage. (For Apostles, this applies as Recovery.) When this value reaches 40, it disappears and you gain 1 Brand. if Blooming Paradise has no remaining dice at the end of the Scene, lose all Whispers.

BattleEffectText.Name: E.G.O. Collapse
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of each stage of the Book Hunters' Stage, Angela takes {0}% of her maximum Stagger Resistance as Stagger damage. If this value reaches 100, you lose the encounter. Decreases each time the Assistant Librarian's Panic is reset on Gebura's Stage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Panic - Fortitude
BattleEffectText.Desc: Attacks allies other than Cocoon. Gain {0} Strength at the start of the Scene and increase damage dealt with attack dice by {1}%.

BattleEffectText.Name: Panic - Prudence
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uses a card on a random character. Each time the dice is rolled, inflicts {0} Stagger damage to all characters. If Stagger Resistance is less than {1} at the end of the Scene, inflict {2} Stagger damage to all Assistant Librarians and then die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Panic - Temperance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uses a card on a random character. When using a card, inflicts {0} Stagger damage to the target. At the end of the scene, inflict Stagger damage to Angela equal to the number of dice remaining * {1}.

BattleEffectText.Name: Panic - Justice
BattleEffectText.Desc: Attacks the Cocoon. When Clashing with a target that is not the Cocoon, the dice power increases by {0}.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blooming Light
BattleEffectText.Desc: If this becomes 0, you lose the reception, and if this is less than 5, you lose control of Speed Dice by the difference from 5 (so 3 would be 2 dice loss). At the start of the Scene, all allies recover {0}% of their health.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blooming Sin
BattleEffectText.Desc: When this character dies, the same amount of Blooming Sin is granted to Angela. If Angela has this effect, Blooming Light decreases by the value of this effect at the start of the Scene, and when clashing with ???' combat pages or when responding to ???'s Mass Attacks, your dice value becomes 0. (This effect triggers up to the Blooming Sin stacks per Scene.)

BattleEffectText.Name: E.G.O. Corruption
BattleEffectText.Desc: Don't be afraid. You'll be at ease soon.

BattleEffectText.Name: March
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the Emotion Coins are full when a card is used, immediately raise the Emotion level and grant March 2 to two random characters. (Priority given to non-march targets) Reduces by 1 at the end of each Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Angela Secretary's Exclusive
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be equipped on Angela (Secretary)'s core page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Angela's Exclusive
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be equipped on Angela (Secretary)'s core page or Blooming Paradise's core page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blooming Paradise's Exclusive
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be equipped on the core page in Blooming Paradise.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blooming Sin
BattleEffectText.Desc: X equals the sum of all the "Stagger Damage" effects activated by your Flow Control pages. If you are not Staggered at the end of an scene, your Qlipoth Counter increases by X.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qlipoth Counter
BattleEffectText.Desc: Reduced by card usage or passive abilities. If it is 1 or higher at the start of the scene, you become Staggered for the duration of that scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Mark
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gains additional effects based on the Flow Control settings of the Patron Librarian. Removed at the end of the scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pale Hands
BattleEffectText.Desc: Speed is reduced and damage and stagger damage taken from dice is increased (once per die). Removed at the end of the scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Obedience
BattleEffectText.Desc: Uncontrollable. When acquiring an emotion coin (might just be positive?), share that emotion coin with the Patron Librarian and one other ally with this effect. This character will try to clash if able, but otherwise attacks the last target attacked by the Patron Librarian. If the Patron Librarian dies, you die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Awe
BattleEffectText.Desc: Each time you win a clash or hit the Patron Librarian, decrease by 1. At the start of the Scene, reduce the Patron Librarian's Qliphoth counter by {0}, and you take {0}% of your maximum Stagger Resistance as Stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pale Hands
BattleEffectText.Desc: Pale Hands has a stack equal to the amount of reduced speed in the scene, and damage and stagger damage taken from dice increases by {0}. This is removed at the end of the scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Suppression : <color=#00ff00>Stable</color>
BattleEffectText.Desc: Maximum light increases by 1. When Staggered, all Qliphoth Counters are lost.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qlipoth Suppression : <color=#ff0000>Overload</color>
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the act, take Stagger damage equal to 2.5 times the number of Qliphoth Counters held.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Suppression : Blooming
BattleEffectText.Desc: Maximum Light increases by 1, and applies the "Protection" effect to all allies at the start of the scene. Qliphoth Counters are reduced by the number of allies affected by the Protection effect. If the Qliphoth Counter is 0 or higher when Staggered, it is reduced to 0 and this ability is lost. If the Qliphoth Counter is less than 0 when Staggered...

BattleEffectText.Name: Qliphoth Suppression : <color=#ff0000>Distortion</color>
BattleEffectText.Desc: You can't Act. Unspecified. After an ally uses a card, each time a clash is lost or a tie occurs, the Qliphoth Counter increases by 1. For each ally's loses a clash or is hit, the Qliphoth Counter decreases by 1. This effect is removed if your Qliphoth Counter is 1 or higher at the end of an scene. Otherwise, it increases by 1, and if another ally dies, it is fixed at 3. At the end of the scene when this effect reaches 3...

BattleEffectText.Name: Purged 1 or more cards
BattleEffectText.Desc: Remove 2 status ailments from the target and reroll the speed die.

BattleEffectText.Name: Purged 2 or more cards
BattleEffectText.Desc: Recovery and Strength bonuses are doubled.

BattleEffectText.Name: Purged 3 or more cards
BattleEffectText.Desc: Recover 1 Light to yourself and the target.

BattleEffectText.Name: Big Eyes
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 2 Counter Dice (Blunt, 4-8)

BattleEffectText.Name: Small Beak
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase damage by the cost of the cards used in this scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Long Arms
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of an scene, apply status effects to all targets and yourself using the cards in the next scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blessing
BattleEffectText.Desc: Restore 1 Light and draw a Bookshelf. Reduce damage taken and Disorientation damage by 2, and increase damage dealt and Disorientation damage by 2. (Applies only once per die.) Disappears at the end of the act.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qlipoth Meltdown (Ally)
BattleEffectText.Desc: Angela triggers a success or failure response effect based on the number of times she uses the Bookshelf on the target she designates.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qlipoth Meltdown: Dawn (Ally)
BattleEffectText.Desc: When Angela uses a Bookshelf on a target (all targetable when using an area-of-effect Bookshelf), the value decreases by 1, and when she uses a Bookshelf on any other target, the value increases by 1. If this effect is 0 at the end of the scene, Angela's Qlipoth counter increases by 2 and the cost of a random Bookshelf with a cost of 3 or more is reduced by 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qlipoth Meltdown: Noon (Ally)
BattleEffectText.Desc: When Angela uses a Bookshelf on a target (all targets that can be designated when using an area-of-effect Bookshelf), the value decreases by 1, and when she uses a Bookshelf on any other target, the value increases by 1. At the end of the scene, if this effect is 0, Angela's Qlipoth Counter is increased by 2, and the cost of a random Bookshelf with a cost of 3 or higher is reduced by 1. (Resets when used) If this effect is 1 or higher, Angela's Qlipoth Counter is reduced by 5, and you gain 1 Strength.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qlipoth Meltdown: Dusk (Ally)
BattleEffectText.Desc: When Angela uses a bookshelf on a target (all targets that can be designated when using an area-of-effect bookshelf), the value decreases by 1, and when she uses a bookshelf on any other target, the value increases by 1. At the end of the scene, if this effect is 0, Angela's Qlipoth Counter increases by 2 and the cost of 2 random bookshelves with their original cost of 3 or more is reduced by 1. (Resets when used.) If this effect is 1 or more, Angela's Qlipoth Counter decreases by 10 and she gains 2 Strength.

BattleEffectText.Name: Qlipoth Meltdown: Midnight (Ally)
BattleEffectText.Desc: When activated, marks are applied to two random bookshelves. If no invalid judgment (draw/joint loss) occurs when the target bookshelf is finished using, its value decreases by 1. (If the bookshelf is "Triggered When Equipped," the value decreases upon use.) If this value is 0 at the end of the scene, Angela's Blooming Sin decreases by 1. If it is 1 or higher, Angela's Blooming Sin increases by 1. If Angela is distracted or dies while under this effect, Angela's Blooming Sin is fixed at 3.

BattleEffectText.Name: When equipped with 2 or more copies
BattleEffectText.Desc: The number of targets increases by 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: When equipped with 3 copies
BattleEffectText.Desc: he number of bookshelves that reduce the cost when a response is successful increases, and the number of Qliphoth counters that decrease when a response is unsuccessful increases.

BattleEffectText.Name: Distortion - Flow Control Card
BattleEffectText.Desc: If your Emotion Level is greater than or equal to the cost of the card, gain the corresponding effect. Does not activate if you are Staggered.

BattleEffectText.Name: Paradox X
BattleEffectText.Desc: If the Emotion Level at the end of the scene is higher than the cost of the corresponding card, the Qliphoth Counter increases by that amount.

BattleEffectText.Name: Noon
BattleEffectText.Desc: If all enemies are granted March, paralyze them.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dusk
BattleEffectText.Desc: If all enemies are granted March, empower allies.

BattleEffectText.Name: Midnight
BattleEffectText.Desc: If all enemies are granted March, gain Emotion Coins regardless of Emotion Level.

BattleEffectText.Name: Noon
BattleEffectText.Desc: The limit on the number of times a duplicate effect can be triggered is removed.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dusk
BattleEffectText.Desc: The "Total Clash Win" effect is triggered twice for speed dice with this effect applied.

BattleEffectText.Name: Midnight
BattleEffectText.Desc: The "On Use" effect for the Speed Dice with the effect applied is triggered twice.

BattleEffectText.Name: Noon
BattleEffectText.Desc: The "On Use" effect and the effect applied to the Dice among the nullified effects are triggered as your own effect.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dusk
BattleEffectText.Desc: The "On Combat Start" effect among the nullified effects is triggered as your own effect.

BattleEffectText.Name: Midnight
BattleEffectText.Desc: The effect applies to all speed dice slots, not just the first.

BattleEffectText.Name: Noon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Additional attacks are triggered even when using a card with a Qliphoth effect.

BattleEffectText.Name: Dusk
BattleEffectText.Desc: The original cost limit of a card is increased when using an additional attack.

BattleEffectText.Name: Midnight
BattleEffectText.Desc: The additional attack activation limit is removed.
